flawed_nl_solution:
He has already done 266 this week because 34 + 20 + 123 + 64 + 23 = <<34+20+123+64+23=266>>266.
If he does 58 he will have done as many as last week because 324 - 266 = <<324-266=58>>58
He has to do 59 on Saturday because 58 + 1 = <<58+1=59>>59
#### 59

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 264, not 266. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
